name: You Can Shrew!
description:
A new kind of Rogue-Like where progress is saved between runs but the amount of runs it takes you to win changes your outcome.

Help Water Shrew reach the bottom of the ocean to retrieve an unknown relic in 28 days - when Winter starts. Skill won't be enough. Build your courage, believe in yourself, and you can reach your goals!

  • The player must reach the bottom by collecting Shrimp. Both shrimp propel the player down further, the special yellow shrimp refilling the shrew’s stamina.
  • The player must avoid Urchins and Fish or else they’ll lose health or, even worse, lives. Health and lives can be purchased as part of the upgrades.
  • The game has a trick system where the more tricks, the more DNA coins are worth. These coins can be used to upgrade Shrew in the middle of a run. The total amount can be used between runs to permanently upgrade Shrew unless, unless they die.
